titles.title: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha
セブンナイツ レボリューション -英雄の継承者-

data.title: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha
data.title_japanese: セブンナイツ レボリューション -英雄の継承者-
data.synopsis:
Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha is set in a world where eons ago valiant heroes fought against the forces of "Destruction." While their deeds passed into legend, the power of these heroes was later inherited by "successors" who fought to protect the world. One day, Faria, a successor of the Seven Knights, saves an ordinary boy named Nemo from the forces of Destruction.

During the ensuing battle, Nemo summons the power of a hero and becomes a successor as well. However, Nemo's hero is a stranger that is unknown to history, and so an epic journey where the past and present collide begins. 

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
data.background: Based on the Seven Knights smartphone role-playing game by Netmarble.

titles.title: Chuukou Ikkan!! Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Valentine-hen
キメツ学園 バレンタイン編
Junior High and High School!! Kimetsu Academy Story: Valentine Edition

data.title: Chuukou Ikkan!! Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Valentine-hen
data.title_english: Junior High and High School!! Kimetsu Academy Story: Valentine Edition
data.title_japanese: キメツ学園 バレンタイン編
data.synopsis:
Zenitsu Agatsuma is determined to be the subject of adoration by receiving chocolates on Valentine’s Day—and this year, he is taking no chances. Enlisting the help of his friend Tanjirou Kamado, the two are prepared to learn from some of Kimetsu Academy's most popular figures. Together, they ask Kyoujurou Rengoku, the history teacher; Giyuu Tomioka, the PE teacher; and Tengen Uzui, the art teacher, about the secrets to their popularity. However, only time will tell if following their advice will bring the same success for Zenitsu.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Kimetsu Gakuen: Valentine-hen is a series of Valentine's Day specials for Kimetsu no Yaiba. The first three episodes were released to Aniplex's official YouTube channel, with the fourth being streamed during the Kimetsu Matsuri Online: Anime 2nd Anniversary Festival.

data.title: Heikousen
data.synopsis: Music video for Eve and suis' song "Heikousen," also used as commercial for the Lotte Ghana Valentine Present campaign.

data.title: Kuiba Zhi Shu Tu
data.synopsis:
The story takes place in Lingshan, where a group of "hopeless" people are gathered on the earth. Most of them are poor, vicious, or extremely evil, abandoned by the society in Lingshan. This is where the fourth generation of Kuiba Mi Lin was born. 

The Heavens struggled to find Kuiba to no avail. In order to eliminate Kuiba, the Heavens determined to blast Lingshan into the ground. Mi Lin rose from the predicament, and his spirit gradually awakened souls with flesh and blood in Lingshan. Mi Lin led the Lingshan Army to sweep across the world, against the Heavens, and became the overlord of the world.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
data.background: Adapted from Qing Qing Shu's (青青树) novel titled Kuiba Zhi Shu (魁拔之书).

data.title: Wanmei Shijie
data.synopsis:
Born into a unique world where villages fight to gain power and control, the main character, Shi Hao, is a genius blessed by the heavens born under the poorest of conditions.

His clan, however, has a mysterious past. To rise up and become the genius he is meant to be, the clan goes through every effort to aid his cultivation as they battle through fanatical monsters and engage in power struggles with other clans.

His journey will bring him through unknown lands until he is able to become a person that can truly shake the world.

(Source: Novels Xianxia&Xuanhuan Wiki)
data.background: Adapted from Chen Dong's (辰东) novel of the same title.

data.title: Initial D Battle Stage 3
data.synopsis:
Initial D: Battle Stage 3 is the eleventh and final installment of the Initial D series. It features every race from Fifth Stage and Final Stage. Unlike the previous two battle stages, it does not feature any new battles, and doesn't feature any character dialogue.

(Source: Initial D Wiki)
